src:
Vídeo: Josiane mata Yohana e Téo no hospital? Imagens surpreendem o público
02 Nov 2019, 14:10 by Russel
Téo descobriu que Josiane assassinou Jardel, o fotógrafo teve acesso à foto que estava escondida no celular de Fabiana e ficou chocado. O rapaz foi logo conversar com a namorada e ela garantiu que agiu no impulso e que estava arrependida. Ele acabou acreditando e disse que não a entregaria à polícia. Jô ficou com medo dele ter uma crise de consciência e armou uma emboscada.
A megera levou o namorado para o motel e deferiu vários golpes nele usando um triturador de gelo, furando em seguida. A vítima foi socorrida a tempo e levada para o hospital, ficando internada na UTI.

Publicidade
Quando Josiane soube que o namorado sobreviveu ao ataque, tratou de ir ao hospital terminar o serviço e quase conseguiu, pois quando estava desligando o aparelho, Yohana chegou no quarto e a vilã teve que interromper seus planos, fingindo que não fazia a menor ideia do que estava acontecendo.
Esta foi a cena exibida pela Globo, mas imagine se ao chegar ao quarto, a policial entregasse seu revólver à vilã pedindo para ela segurar um pouco, enquanto verificava se estava tudo bem com Téo. Josiane não pensaria duas vezes para atirar nos dois e se livrar deles logo.

Publicidade
Este vídeo foi compartilhado pela atriz Agatha Moreira em seu perfil no Instagram e ela se divertiu, incluindo na legenda: “Cena alternativa. Segura pra mim rapidinho“.
Os três fizeram uma brincadeira e o público amou o bom humor deles, confira.



Mas na novela o desfecho é outro, Téo recobrará a consciência, entregará Josiane e Yohana fará questão de algemá-la e levá-la para a prisão.
text:
Video: Does Josiane kill Yohana and Téo at the hospital? Images surprise the public
02 Nov 2019, 14:10 by Russell
Theo discovered that Josiane murdered Jardel, the photographer had access to the photo that was hidden in Fabiana's cell phone and was shocked. The boy soon went to talk with his girlfriend and she said she acted on impulse and was sorry. He eventually believed and said he would not hand her over to the police. Joe was afraid he would have a crisis of conscience and set an ambush.
The vixen took her boyfriend to the motel and dealt him several blows using an ice crusher, then drilled. The victim was rescued on time and taken to hospital and was admitted to the ICU.

publicity
When Josiane learned that her boyfriend had survived the attack, she tried to go to the hospital to finish the job and almost succeeded, as when she was turning off the phone, Yohana arrived in the room and the villain had to interrupt her plans, pretending she had no idea of the that was happening.
This was the scene shown by Globo, but imagine if when she arrived in the room, the policewoman handed her revolver to the villain asking her to hold a little while checking if everything was okay with Teo. Josiane would not think twice to shoot them both and get rid of them soon.

publicity
This video was shared by actress Agatha Moreira on her Instagram profile and she had fun including in the caption: “Alternative Scene. Hold it fast for me.
The three made a joke and the audience loved their good mood, check it out.



But in the soap opera the outcome is different, Téo will regain consciousness, deliver Josiane and Yohana will make sure to handcuff her and take her to prison.
